title: Did Amy Connie Barrett say, "Is it called a word that does not constitute a hostile work environment?"
subtitle: Barrett wrote to a panel of three judges unanimously in 2019, which upheld the dismissal of the workplace discrimination suit by a black employee who claims to have called for ethnic seduction by a supervisor.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Judge Amy Connie Barrett, who was nominated to the U.S. Supreme Court in 2020, once declared that n's name did not constitute a hostile working environment.
